articles.title: Markets live updates: Oil and gold prices jump, while shares slip after Israel strikes Iran
articles.description: Markets are also digesting inflation data and the US-China trade talks. Follow the day's events and insights as they happen with our business reporters on the ABC News live markets blog.
articles.content:
Israel's air strikes on Iran have had an immediate and dramatic effect on financial markets.
Most notably, the global benchmark Brent crude oil futures contract had surged 11.3% to $US75.75 a barrel by 1pm AEST.
